name: Cerbero 20-20-20
description: Cerbero 20-20-20 is an NPK water-soluble fertilizer featuring a very high degree of solubility, purity and the absence of chlorine and sodium. The 1:1:1 NPK ratio makes it perfectly balanced and versatile and able to be used during the entire life-cycle of the crop. Cerbero 20-20-20 guarantees complete plant nutrition and enhances growth and yield while forestalling the onset of nutritional deficiencies or imbalances.
